text: Order delivery tonight. Item #6, Pizza and Fingers For 2. With no delivery charge, it came out to $14 dollars. The delivery took 45 minutes (as promised), the pizza was delicious!!!, and the chicken fingers were doused with sauce. I will probably order again. :)

It's easy to eat nothing but chain food restaurant fare on the Strip; hence, my family enjoyed venturing a little bit away from the high-priced resorts and McDonald's to visit Palermo's Pizza.

We visited this wonderful restaurant twice and were very impressed with the high quality of the food and service as well as the low prices. This friendly family-owned restaurant offers homemade Italian food--the recipes are original and excellent. 

We ordered a cheese pizza and fettuccine Alfredo--they both were tasty and the portion sizes were good.

If there was an option for 0 stars I would go with that. This place sucks. Ordered twice because it's right down the street from work, over two hours  for delivery both times. Second time we ordered we were told it would be 45 min, nobody told us there were a bunch of orders and that they were busy, just 45 minutes. After 1hr we called to ask where the order was and the guy on the phone told us that the driver was out with our delivery already, that he had three orders total and ours was one of them. At 1hr 45 min I called back and was told that our order had not left yet, guy on the phone decided to be mouthy and argumentative rather than apologize and try and fix it. Totally unprofessional, and if you read the other reviews on Yelp, you'll see that my story is not unique. Tons of other reviews talking about long delivery time and rude service. This place has a problem with customer service and the food is so average that it makes cafeteria food look like fine dining. The owner likes to post responses that are 100% fabricated nonsense, obviously based on all the different negative reviews his business is the problem, however much he tries to act like its the customers problem. Avoid this place like herpes

When my fiance and I lived over on that side of town, we ordered Palermos. I got a chicken sandwich that the two of us ended up splitting. We both got food poisoning, so definitely wouldn't recommend ordering food from them...or at least steer clear of the chicken sandwich.
Delicious pizza!! And wings were so delish. Frank was very friendly and recommended a great special. We will definitely be back!!
Very fast and friendly service. The delivery guy got to my hotel room in 30 min. Pizza was a great alternative to the typical dominoes/ Pizza Hut. I would recommend !!

Loved this place! Very flavorful. Ordered a large supreme pizza... We wanted to save money by going off the strip for a box of pizza.. And this was perfect! Opens late. Conveniently down the street from where we were staying. Will be coming back the next time we are in town :)
£uking gross and dirty... Look out for the roach in the pizza.. Yum and no extra charge

The best pizza we have ever tried! Great customer service! The prices are great as well! Everytime we visit Las Vegas we make sure to make this place the first we visit and the last! We take pizza back home and even after the 4 hour drive its still the best pizza ever!!!!

Pies so good that we had it two nights in a row, while on vacation.

Incredibly awesome NY style pizza.

This was my second time ordering here. The first time was really great I ordered my food & the guy told me I would have my order in about 30 mins & I got it in time. This second time when I ordered, I asked if there was a delivery minimum & the guy told me $15. So I told him I would call back. I look at the flyer & it says it's a $10 minimum. So I called again and explained to him that it said $10 and he said maybe it was an old paper. At 2:39 pm I ordered my food & he tells me it's gonna take 45 mins. 3:34 pm my food still hasnt arrived so I call again and ask what the status of my order was & the guy tells me the driver has it & it should be here shortly. 4:07 pm comes along & my food finally arrives. Mind you, my place of business is maybe not even a 1/2 mile away. It's literally on the other side of the intersection. So unless you won't be hungry until almost 2 hours after you order, I recommend you don't order for delivery.

I don't what's going on but I placed an order about an hour ago to be delivered. I have not received a phone call nor any other type of confirmation for my order other than what was on yelp. Worst pizza service I've ever had in my life. DO NOT ORDER FOR DELIVERY FROM HERE

Awful. I can't think of a reason to give this place more than a two star.  I placed an order for two Greek Salad lunch specials, which include a Greek salad with olives, onions, feta, etc, garlic bread, and a soda. 
What I got instead was the saddest salad I've ever seen. It was tiny and had absolutely no feta on it. What kind of Greek salad doesn't have feta on it? No garlic bread. Just some sad pita to go with it. 

What's the worst, is that I placed my order via Grubhub 12:42 pm. It wasn't until 2:30- almost two hours later, that we received our lunch. 

Never ever ordering from here again.

I grew up in Vegas and somehow never enjoyed this amazing place. My husband and I were here on vacation and wanted pizza delivered to our off strip hotel - palermos delivered in about half the time time they even quoted. The delivery man was awesome and friendly, even tho the timeshare property we were staying in is complicated to navigate. 
And now for the food, super delicious and piping hot upon arrival.  I ordered a pepperoni pizza, cheese bread and wings. Everything was good. Their ranch is homemade and perfect for dipping. The wings were a little dry and crispy but that happens to be my preference so I was really happy. Bottom line, I'd order again!
Found this place by accident and what a surprise! I ordered the bake ziti and it was delicious. Serving size is huge for the price. Salad and cheese were fresh. Good stuff!

Man I love their pizza! Best pizza I've had! My little girl loves it too! There chicken fingers are also delicious! Can't say enough about this place! Truly one of the best in Vegas! Definitely going to order from here for the big fight!

My new favorite pizza in Las Vegas. All around perfection, the man who answered the phone was helpful with specials, I choose a great deal and our food arrived in less than 30 minutes. The pizza was perfect and that's rare anywhere esp in this city. We will become regular customers!

I am new in the neighborhood so I decided to try their food this morning. Guy who works there was really helpful. He helped me to choose really good pizza and salad. Very nice and polite staff.  Place is clean. And food... is delicious. I love it. Definitely will be back there! 5 stars! You should try it!
Had call ones as big as my head. No fountain soda, which is a bummer. Friendly staff, fast service and delicious food.

You can only eat Pizza Hut and Dominoes so many times, so I decided to go local, and I'm glad I did. This pizza is awesome, the mozzerella sticks are killer, food is always fresh, and these people are fast. So excited I finally found some good pizza in Vegas!

Ordered at 11:30am....1:15pm we called twice..first time guy said food was on its way...second time he said the food was right in front of him...we stayed he would like to cancel because food was taking too long and would be cold...guy on the phone started cussing at us...HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

Never again. Little Caesars was better. Just sayin. I decided to try them. I ordered a thin crust Hawaiian extra crispy it was soggy everywhere. I ordered lasagna it was super burned. I ordered 4 extra ranches got none. Told them no salad got that lol. I had to walk the order back because I wasn't going to wait and hope to get a refund for. A driver. NOW IT WAS A SUPER FAST DELIVERY...they did refund it and the manager was cool once I got there.....other than try and tell me nothing was burned. BRO I WALKED 6 BLOCKS TO GIVE IT BACK...I THINK IT WAS BURNED. 


ORDER CAFE VERDE, FLAMINGO PIZZA, OR BOSTON PIZZA FOR GOOD PIE. 
IF I COULD GIVE NO STARS I WOULD!!!!!!

This place is CRAZY now the owner calls me back after a bad review but Mike said the manger is NEVER THERE I ordered salad no cooked food.. The owner says due to my bad review on them he's cancelling my order lol.. Ok cancel the order cause at his point u may try and poison me smh bad business... I wish I could show y'all these wings

Great Pizza and Great Customer Service!
I am originally from NJ and not easily impressed when it comes to pizza. I have tried many of the so called "greats" out here and nobody holds a candle to Palermo's White Pizza! I can also speak personally for the salads as well as the veggie calzone, all good. I'm definitely looking forward to trying a few more items now that I know I've found a place I can trust....call ahead if you have any concerns, I had a few special requests and they were more than accommodating, Thanks again Palermo's!

Ordered delivery. Pizza was at my house in 35 minutes. Overall the pizza tasted great, fresh toppings, good sauce. Only downfall and the reason for 4 stars is the center 1/3 of the pizza was very soggy. Probably.needed a couple more minutes in the oven.

The delivery for this place is outrageous. I order from this place because the food is good and the prices are fair. Prepare to wait over an hr. Even if u live next door. They should be honest about wait time and let u come in to pick up if its that long of a wait.

Perfect late night snack.
The delivery guy Trayce was there in 20 minutes with the most delicious pizza I've ever had. Great customer service , loved their pepperoni pizza. Definitely calling back this place on my next visit in Las Vegas. Thumbs up for this place .

Ordered online through Eat24. Ordered the lunch special consisting of salad, soda and garlic bread. They forgot to give me the garlic bread (Eat24 reimbursed me for the bread).  The chef salad was good. Delivery was within 45. minutes and delivery guy was nice. Will give them a second chance and order from them again.

I'm from the Philly area and since being here in Las Vegas I've been craving a Philly cheese steak. I've tried several places that hadn't come close until I had one here. that was the best cheese steak I've every experienced. The bread was toasted, real steak meat with grilled onions mushrooms and green peppers oh white cheese. Good job guys. You all became my cheese steak house of the West Coast.
The manager here is very rude. Did not want to rectify issues of honesty or quality. The customer is definitely not first with this establishment.
I ordered a philly cheesesteak and it all mushrooms and barely any meat

Review time !!!! I don't think I have ever enjoyed food the way I do now due to my pregnancy ! Today I was craving a veggie pizza And i was actually very surprised how good it was ,Chicken wings were amazing ,garlic bread delicious , my caprese salad was much different then I am use to but it was good . My only problem and complain would be the fettuccine Alfredo  I was disappointed on the sauce it actually had very little didn't even taste like Alfredo  unfortunately it was boring (plain) . I also don't know how accurate it is to order online they did get my order right but I left notes to add more and I didn't get it in my order . I also wish the driver didn't forget my chilly peppers or Parmesan cheese I would have tip him oh well ! Lastly I give them 3stars because my experience wasn't horrible nor was it the best !
Please don't say 5 minutes just waiting on them pizza,  and 30 minutes later you forgot to cook them chicken wings.  Then say waiting on them wings. Not happy,  with service at all

I would like to rate the food, but it never got here. The delivery driver came to our work, sat in his car for 5 minutes and then came to door and knocked. The door was answered immediately and the driver said that he had been waiting at the door for about a half an hour. (Surveilence cameras confirm the park and wait 5 minutes.) We told him to just hold on for a second while we grabbed the person who placed the order (there are about 50 people in the building at this time) and he told us to not to call there again while he is literally shoving his foot in the door. Since we are in a secure building, all deliveries need to stay outside of the door. Literally about 30 seconds later the person who ordered came to the door and the driver was already getting back in his car. Since this order was placed through Eat 24, the person who ordered called them back and was promptly told the restaurant was refusing to give any money back because we made him wait unreasonably long. Eat 24 was kind enough to oblige my employee her money back in the form of credit to her account. Unfortunately, my employee was now on her lunch break with no lunch and heaping helping of crappy service from a cranky curmudgeon. I called te restaurant to see if I could reason with their manager and provide proof of the driver lying about the wait time (which could also be proven with Eat 24 call records) and also to see if we could get past this as my employees order daily from this estabishment. I was given the run around by the staff and eventually hung up on. I called back and they told me that they would have the manager call me back. It has been 3 weeks and I have not received a call back. I am glad that some people have a great experience with Palermo's Pizza, but as for my employees...not one of them will ever patronize or reccomend this restaurant to anybody. Customer service is as important to a restaurant as it's product, if their customer service is a reflection of their product they must be making a killing in the sale of feces.

My boyfriend and I go here all the time. Generally we order pick-up and we always ask for modifications like extra thin or hot sauce on the side and they always accommodate our quirky requests. The CVS / Albertson's complex they're in is pretty divey and the guys who work there are all relatively chill, but super no nonsense just a forewarning. I definitely saw a couple kids kicked out of there for "bad language" one time, which was kind of bizarre. However, it's really about the food! They're very quick so pick up is always a breeze. We've tried a couple pizza places around the UNLV area and this is by far one of the best tasting. Thanks for the quick service and great food guys!
Great food in large portions. I got a meat calzone and I can easily say that it is the best I've ever eaten. I would easily eat here again.

I like Palermo's pizza sauce and crust. They have this 7.99 carry out special that I usually get . This last time it was a bit short on the pepperoni but still tasted how I remembered it. The gentlemen that work there are nice. I've only had the pepperoni and cheese pizza here but they are always good.

The place was absolutely fabulous! Small, quaint,  inexpensive, good portions and, best of all, its delicious. Got a round of wings with my brother and they were absolutely astounding. I highly recommend it as its way better than than any of the other small places around the area. My definite favorite part though was the adorably cute little white boy with the snapback on. If I could have ordered a side of him everytime Palermos would be the one and only. Super quick and attentive staff but boy was that skinny, beautiful noodle a taste of marvel. Grand experience. Get the wings with their marvelous ranch ant spot the cutie with the hat. 5 for 5 Palermos. (Had to register an account just to give props. Keep the hot guy, he made my whole day!)

It's hard to find a good pizza place that delivers around here. Ordered pasta from here once before ( not that good) and decided to try it again for pizza. Delivery was fast and prices are good. Too bad the pizza isn't good. Got a basic margarita pizza. It was soggy and tasted a little under done. Had way too much garlic on it that should not have been on it in the first place. Won't be ordering again.
This place was a recommendation of one of my friends, and it is amazing! I had the pizza Supreme and it was delicious!!  I loved it! Very friendly staff.
Cheese steak sandwiches should not be bone-dry and devoid of peppers and onions.  Truly awful and you should be ashamed.  Don't waste your time and money.

Great spot located next to my house. Just placed a delivery order and the guy who took the order was very nice and friendly. Ordered the Greek salad and meat lasagne which was pretty good. Good sized portion and delivery time was quick (8pm Saturday night).
They have a good special that includes 2 slices of pizza and a soda for like $6. I go here when I am craving a cheap pizza fix. They save my number and greet me when I answer the phone. Good stuff.

This place is great, now there are a lot of pizza joints on this side of town but this place has without a doubt the best customer service i have seen in years. Employees make you feel like family from just the first visit, and of course the food was delicious.

Ok so this is nothing personal towards the people who work here and I don't like to complain about food. I usually have something good to say but I'm sorry this just can't be ignored or brushed off. The wings are TERRIBLE. I barely touched it because soon as I opened the plate there was a funny smell. There was still feathers on the wings and it just didn't look appetizing at all. I did order a 12" cheese pizza and a slice of cheesecake which was good. But I while I was eating the pizza all I could think about were the wings (both the look of it and the smell) I just lost my appetite and I'm trying not to throw up SMH. I called and spoke to someone about getting a refund and having them take the wings back. I wouldn't even feed the chicken to my kids. Shit not even dog would want it. I'm sorry I just can't with the wings.

Very good pizza. Sauce was nice and had good spices. Crust was between thin and regular. For 7.99 I got this 12" pizza and a soda.  Great deal. Took about 10 min. Super fresh.  Good stuff.  Then they brought us a surprise order of zeppoles. Oh my. You gotta have some of these.  They are like little hot donuts doused powdered sugar.  Highly recommend.

Don't ever order anything from this place. I place my order and it said it would be ready 12-35 mins. I came in 45 mins later and the guy tells me we never put in your order. Can you wait 10 mins??? Really I'm on my break the whole reason of ordering is to not wait. Never ever again. I never would recommend this place no more.

I ordered a pepperoni pizza for my 9 year old son only to find I ordered a pepperoni pizza for my 9 year old son only to find not only did tgey NOT bring any of the extra packets that i askes for and they took over and hour to get here but also found  hairs inside of my sons pizza! so !!!!

Horrid Service, iffy food

NY Style, pepperoni pizza - bleh. Salad was actually pretty good. Teeniest chicken wings I've ever seen.

Delivery only brought part of the order. Took another two hours to get the wings.

Then it turned out they charged us 6 times on our card - $150!!! Went to their place twice, called multi[ple times. Still trying to get our money back.

I ordered delivery from them today. Despite the fact that I live only 8 minutes away from their location, it took more than an hour and a half to get food. By the time it did get here, my pizza was cold already. I would definitely not recommend these guys, I guess you get what you pay for since this place is cheap.
The pizza take a little time,but it well worth the wait. I would order everyday,but i need to eat thing that isn't pizza. Sadly.

I was craving a really good burger and onion rings at 10pm, I am fairly new to this town so i really dont know any good places that deliver that late. I decided to check on line and see if i could find something, when i came across www.grubhub.com and Palermos Pizza was #1 on the list. 
I was not too sure about it but i saw the prices so i decided to give it a try ($10 minimum order and FREE delivery) needless to say my total was $11.50 and I got a very DELICIOUS hamburger, AMAZING  seasoned fries, crunchy onion rings, and a great ny cheesecake! 
So glad i found this place and I will be ordering from them soon!
Have ordered multiple times. The pizza and wings are good, the order takers on the phone are helpful, and the delivery people are friendly.
Very nice place, feels homie with a very nice and helpful staff, I was walking by and the delicious aroma caught my attention, of course I had to go in and give it a try :).
Really bad and unsanitary pizza joint it smells like booty and hairspray if there was a description to that awful smell

We felt it necessary to write about our disappointment in the pizza we received.  1.  The pizza was undone.  2.  The crust was floppy, unable to hold in our hands.  3. Had to eat it  with a fork.  4.  WORST OF ALL, the pizza was all on one side of the box, crushed together, all in a ball.  Appeared that it might have been in a game on the way to our home. 5.  It was as ordered, an 18" pizza sliced irregularly into 10 pieces rather than 12 as done in other places, and needless to say we were only able to eat the half that wasn't sticking to the side of the box.. 6. We gave it a 2 rating because the sauce deserved at least a small rating. We ill not order again from Palermo's.  Bob C.

When I walked in the door the guy at the front said "I hope you're hungry!". I wasn't starving so I got the lunch special, two slices of cheese pizza and a soda for $3.99! Can't beat that deal. I added pepperoni but it honestly didn't need it.

The crust was super thin and perfectly crispy. I loved it.

I will definitely come back the next I am in the area!

The owner was friendly, the food was good and cheap, and I was in and out in 5 minutes.

They do a bunch of lunch specials and I also saw the 36" pizza box when I was walking out. It would be perfect for a big party!!! They also have a $6.99 carry out special for a large cheese.

Utterly horrific experience with this establishment. We ordered online. Waited an hour and a half. Heard nothing from them. Called them. They denied having the order.... told us to call "Slice" (their payment processor). Slice called them and they had conveniently lost the order. They did not apologize and did NOTHING to fix it. I now have a hungry house with a bunch of pissed off people. Terrible business

Ordered delivery to Hard Rock Hotel around 8:15. Was told that it would be 30-45 minutes- It took an hour and fifteen minutes.  I ordered a 14" pizza with 15 wings. Pizza was room temp and a very thin crust. Wings were pretty good, I would order the wings again but might skip on the pizza. If I ordered again as it took a long time to get food.

I love their pizza. I really do. I've been going to Palermos for four years. Customer service lacks strongly but the pizza has always been worth it until today. I have always ordered the pizza and came to pick it up. Today I decided I would get it delivered. They told me 45-1. Pretty standard. At an hour and twenty I called, driver on its way. At an hour forty five my husband was beyond pissed. Driver finally shows up no apology, no discount, just two hour wait for a cold pizza. We skipped the pizza. So disappointed.  Truly the only negative review I have given. Pizza is really good. ORDER TO GO AND PICK IT UP YOURSELF! They need to just stop delivery and focus on the small parlor

10/16 Response to owners (Apology) - Not much of an apology since you had to explain your side. Secondly, after reviewing other reviews it seems it is not unusual at all for you to be very late on delivering and then take no responsibility for it. It took almost 2 HOURS to get our pizza Not a few minutes late. When I placed my order the cashier told me 45-to an hour maybe sooner That was his exact words. Not could be longer could have traffic etc....... Lastly, we absolutely wanted a discount. My card did decline, dont know what that has to do with your horrible service but ill admit that. My husband did have cash. The driver called you on our request and asked if we could have a discount for our wait, you told him no take the food if he doesn't want to pay. My husband took pizza out for our kid, gave the driver $10 and said tell ur manager we wont be using delivery service again. Yup we may not have been pleasant after our two hour wait but a real apology would have went a long way. Four years of ordering your pizza for my office, events, and home. I will no longer buy from you period and will explain now to all that ask that your poor customer service now has outweighed the pizza

Palermo's was a pretty decent pizza for the price. I got the chicken fingers and pizza special for $12, which was a great deal. The delivery was a bit slow but free, so no complaints there. I'd order again.

BBQ wings are good. I loved the cheese bread, people say oh it's greasy lol, uh yea it's loaded with melted cheese. My son liked the mozzarella sticks. Turkey subs are good when toasted, The Stromboli's are amazing.

I was in  Vegas a few weeks ago and I ordered from here twice. Everything was so great. One of the best salads I have had from a pizza joint anywhere. The delivery driver was so sweet. When I am in Vegas again this will always be my go to pizza place.

I have been getting deliveries from PALERMO'S PIZZA, for a few years now. The pizza comes hot. The traditional Italian dishes are always made perfectly. Whoever takes your order always gets it correctly. The very best part if it, is that the food us excellent. Much better than expected delivery food. They've never disappointed me. I'm sure they won't disappoint you either!
Dennie

If you want greasy overpriced pizza, then this is the place for you. Also they messed up order as well. Ordered some cheese sticks but we were given fried zucchini instead. Just some friendly advice for the owner, maybe smile just once?
Love the pizza there and the wings is a family restaurant low price and very good food and very nice service

First time trying them today! I ordered a large 1/2 pineapple 1/2 mushroom for lunchtime delivery. The person who answered the phone was friendly, helpful and also gave me dessert recommendations. The pizza arrived within 30-40 minutes as promised and the delivery man was super friendly too!

The pizza was warm and tasted great! I rarely use Yelp and post reviews, but getting seamless and friendly customer service is becoming more of a rarity now a days, so I had to return the favor and share my experience. :) Will definitely order again in the future!

The pizza is good here. Although there was a funny smell to it. They have great prices and they actually sell SLICES! Not common in vegas.

I plan on eating here again with hopes of no funny smell to the pizza

Found this place by accident and have been here a few times in the last month. The staff is super friendly, the prices are more than reasonable,  and the food is amazing. I personally can't live without their buffalo wings. They're way better than the pizza places I used to have delivered,  cheaper, and larger. Plus, they're crisp and flavorful. When I'd order from pizza hut or dominoes the wings were either soggy from being half baked or boneless and crunchy. I would recommend this place to anyone.

The one star is due to the fact that food here is delicious,however the service and delivery is horrendous. We have ordered the food on a couple of occasions to have it delivered to our place of business and the wait time has never been under 2 hours.

The "manager" has a tendency to lie about wait time or driver whereabouts, assuring you "the driver is right around the corner"..then 45 minutes later you have your food.

That is no way to run a business.

I say, if you plan to try this place out, eat in and save yourself the irritation of waiting hours for your food if you get it delivered.

I'm never ordering from here again. I've been ordering for delivery from Palmeros for almost 2 years. The food is mediocre but it's cheap. The last 4 times I've gotten anything from there it's been at least 15 minutes later than said. Today it was 30 minutes later than confirmed in eat24. That's an hour and 15 minutes... Ridiculous.

I had the 12 inc hawaiian 
The pizza was extraordinarily good. I will return. With my pizza I did remove the ham & I added pepperoni. The salads sound great but I did not try it today. The sign said they serve calzones now I've never had one & I was so chicken I did not try it today. Maybe next time.
I ordered a pizza yesterday and it was the best I have had since I came to the states!

my wife and i ordered a pizza and a calzone and we were very unhappy with our order . first it took over an hour and half to get my pizza the driver said his gps sent him else where and we live 10 minutes away. second the pizza was ice cold when i called back the wanted to give a discount on my next pizza or re heat it we already waited over an hour.and last we ordered a ham and pineapple calzone and they forgot to put the ham i will never order pizza here again im not even going to rate the place they dont deserve it

Can I give zero stars!!!  My husband waited in a wheelchair for 45 minutes outside the entrance where the driver said he would be. Then I wait for 15 minutes after they said they would send the delivery driver AGAIN!  no one ever showed up. Only lyft and uber. No pizza guy although I asked everyone. They told us where to wait. This was their decision. What horrible service. Thank goodness I didn't pay in advance. Run away if you really want your food to show up.

By far the rudest customer service! Ordered delivery at 12:42 pm called at 2:27pm to see what was taking so long. The man on the phone said that the delivery driver had come to my place already... NOT TRUE!! He then asked if he would like me to send the driver AGAIN!! (Hmmm kinda strange since he was so adamant that the driver had already come)
No I'm sorry I don't want food that has been sitting in a car for over an hour and a half. 
He then claimed that he was going to block my number because I canceled my order of food that most likely sitting in a hot car for over half an hour.
The terrible reputation is well earned

I ordered a Glutten free veggie pizza and a Caprese salad.  They rocked my special order, the pizza was fantastic and the salad was great.  I have ordered twice from them and not been disappointed.  The delivery people were professional and courteous.  Good food and I am a "foodie" Thanks Palermo's!
I personally watched the kitchen worker scratch his ear, then dig in it and not wash his hands.  I'm not coming back. That A health code rating it's false.

Just tried this place today and I gotta say it was pretty freaking delicious. I got the two slices of pepperoni with a drink for $5. I didn't expect much from this place but it was perfect. The place is very clean and the staff it's really nice. Definitely coming back soon

Stopped in after work to grab a slice to hold me over until dinner (since I wouldn't have a chance to eat until very late). I immediately noticed that their pizza was greasy to the point where it was somewhat unappetizing, and both the toppings and crust were lacking in flavor. I doubt I would have finished it were I not starving. The food wasn't bad per se, but I probably wouldn't give this place a second try. 

The price was more than fair, the staff was kind and the restaurant was very well maintained.

The owner is extremely nice here!!! 

I was late picking up my pizza because of a last minute work meeting and he really remade my pizza for me and gave us suckers while we waited. 

Really sweet guy!!!!! 


Love it here

Worst pizza I ever had . I was too hungry and had been there to eat pizza . I waited 15 minutes and the pizza come . I notice I would like to eat there but they gave me in Togo box . It's was over cooked . Too dark at back of pizza . I don't want to recomand anyone there to get pizza . Better go somewhere else . Waste of money and time .  .   Worthless place ....
I'm impressed. Delicious food. Driver was very very kind. 5 min late if that and made sure to contact me ahead of time. 15 min from there to my home no extra fee and food arrived fresh and hot!!

DO NOT ORDER ONLINE!!!!  

After waiting 1 hour and 10 minutes for a day time delivery I called the business and the person that answered said that it takes 20 minutes for the order to get sent to them from the online service. This is strange because about 10 minutes after I placed the order the business called me about a question on the order. So they had my order. Just a Bullshit excuse. My 6 year old tells better lies. 

The pizzas that were delivered were warm, not hot. They were ok. Way better than the big chains. I would have given them 4 stars if they hadn't bullshitted me about the delays.

We will never order from here again. We placed an order for a pizza. It arrived with half the toppings on the side of the box from sliding off. Then the crust was soggy. There is no crust. It's soggy dough and undercooked.

When we called to discuss the situation, the manager told us that wasn't his problem. That he'll get paid anyways from BiteSquad... When we tried to discuss this further, the manager interrupted and talked over us on the phone. It's not his problem he served us undercooked and poorly prepared food. Got it.


Edit: I went back to read other reviews and noticed a common theme... When the owner/manager whoever that dude is responds to the complaints, it's always someone else's fault... Never his or his employees.


You sir, are a LIAR. WE DID NOT ORDER THIN CRUST OR TRIPLE CHEESE!! IT WASN'T EVEN AN OPTION ON THE APP!! our choices were regular crust or garlic crust. We choose regular crust!! I WILL POST PICS OF OUR EMAIL CONFIRMATION TO SUPPORT IF YOU INSIST ON LYING.

After waiting over 1.5 hours for a soggy undercooked pizza delivered at 9pm, you offered to remake it. And wait another hour and a half for redelivery!?!? NO!! NOT ACCEPTABLE!! 

Take some responsibility and own your mistakes!! 

We will never ever support this local business ever again.

This pizza place was a hidden gem! I went here with  my boyfriend for a quick lunch. When you walk in it's clean,old fashioned and has a tv with an Xbox attached. Anyone can play and it's free I thought that was really neat. We sat at the booth where the xbox was and we ordered our food a burger and some wings. This place really reminded me of a mom and pops pizza shop that I use to work at in Texas. The food came out hot and fresh! Customer service was amazing. The boy at the cash register kept checking on us. He even told me about the special they had during lunch that comes with a drink. Gold star for looking out for your guests! Palermos has it all! Good food,good service and nice homey vibe!
This is good pizza.  I ordered a 12" Palermo Supreme.  The crust was light and crunchy.  They make their own dough.  I was impressed.  Service was great too.  Friendly staff.  I recommend it!

I was going to have lunch today at Vegas Buffet,a Chinese buffet on Flamingo but I was unable to do so because they had been shut down yesterday by the health inspector.I walked through the Albertson's mall trying to decide where to go.I noticed this pizza place which I had walked past countless times before.I said "Why not" and decided to give it a try.I had a lunch special,a 12 inch pizza with anchovies and a soda,both for a total of around 8 dollars,reasonable enough.The pizza was as good as any I've ever had in Las Vegas.When you come from New York City like I do,you often find that the pizza here leaves a lot to be desired.The pizza here was exactly the way I prefer it,thick,soft crust and not overcooked.The owner Manuel was very friendly and personable.When you walk in,it's not the fanciest looking place but based on my meal I have NO hesitation to give this place 5 stars.I am planning on going back in the very near future.If you like your pizza New York Style,you will definitely enjoy Palermo's Pizza.
Fast and very friendly service. $7.99 for an extra large pizza. Really good New York style pizza. Very delicious!

What a ripoff!! I would give this place negative stars if I could! $21 for an 18' Supreme Pizza with maybe three pieces of pepperoni per slice and light ingredients on the whole pie. Whoever is making their pizzas doesn't know how to put toppings on a pizza. I bet if it was their pizza it would of been loaded lol!! If you want to spend your money on mostly dough, this is the perfect place! Next time I'll go to Smiths and buy a frozen pizza instead lol!
The worst food ever. I ordered delivery it took well over an hour even though they said 35 min. Fries were soggy.   Gyro was greasy.   Overall GROSS.

Both the gentleman on the phone when I called in to place the order and the deliveryman were very nice. Overall the pizza had a good flavor. The crust could have been just a little thicker. I ordered an 18" Pepperoni Pizza and I seriously doubt if there were 20 slices of pepperoni atop the entire pizza. Finally, a bit pricey for what showed up in the box.

Stayed at the LVH for a trade show at the convention center. Decided to order a pizza because the food was terrible at my hotel. After waiting 45 minutes on a Thursday my delivery person didn't have the change for my $28 pizza order from $40 cash. He then offered to go down to the casino to get change, at this point it was almost 9 at night and I was hungry enough to say f*ck it. I think the most irritating part was I am an excellent tipper and was already planning on leaving a nice tip.

Pizza was very average and soggy. 

Don't support crappy local business.

Palermo's is just like New York Pizza and I am from New York. The people here are very cool the prices are amazing! And anyone that doesn't give this place five stars doesn't know how good they got it This place ROCKS!

Order a pizza with mushrooms and mozzarella sticks from eat24 the online app. Food was gross and half an hour late. Called the restaurant and they had the driver call me and apparently he couldn't find my apartment and got mad at me and started yelling at me then hung up on me when I asked why he didn't call if he couldn't find the place. Called the restaurant to let them know how rude the delivery guy was and they apolozed and asked if I would call back tomorrow and they would give me something for free. Food was sick and cold (we had to heat it up in the microwave) and our pizza was missing the mushrooms. service was horrible I wouldn't eat there again even if it was free.
Food is always great and for a great price.  Decor could be better, but im all about their food.
Great take out specials... Pizza is a bit doughy, but if you like NY pizza, then this is a good bet!
One of the best pizza places in Vegas! All pizzas I've tried here have been delicious! You can immediately tell they always use fresh ingredients of good quality. I'll go back for sure...
Gave them a second chance, regretted it. Two hours for delivery and the toppings had slid off of one pizza. Never again.

zero Stars would be better. We place an order over the phone and "Frank" tells us that you will get it in the next 30 minutes and well one hour and 45 minutes later, we get some cold food and delivery wanted to tell me what happened. 
Accepted the food but this mistake and this place will not happen again! 
Sad to hear you lie about delivery time Frank to bring in the sale...

Food was average at best. Took close to two hours for delivery on a Wednesday night and then they forgot to include the soda I paid for. Guy on the phone stated he would have to contact the app I ordered through (yelp) for the refund. Yet to receive the refund or hear back from Yelp. I sent them a message as well. Food arrived lukewarm to cold. Customer service sucks and food is not great. Don't waste your money. Lesson learned about this place. Sucks because I prefer to patronize locally owned business because chain pizza usually sucks. Don't get lured in by free delivery...you end up paying one way or another

I'm still shocked at how horrible my service was with Palermo's Pizza today.

I ordered a cold tuna sandwich for lunch today at work. Now we order from them all the time at work and last time I ordered the exact same thing I ordered today it took twenty minutes today it took over two hours and I never even got my food.

There is honestly nothing worse than waiting two hours at work for food that is never coming. 

I called not once but twice to see why it was taking so long and their excuse was the driver got turned around. It's a tuna sandwich. You literally have to put tuna on bread and drive it over here. Definitely not a two hour wait.

Finally I gave up on getting fed and called and asked for them to cancel my order and return my money. Then I got hung up on.

Super professional. 

No one at our establishment will be ordering from here again. If you value your time and money you wouldn't either.

We got wings and dessert here last night, we ate the dessert first and it was okay, nothing amazing but not bad.
Then we eat most of our wings (we were in our room with the lights off and only the tv on) and they didn't taste that great so I turn on the lights to clean up and to my surprise the wings were undercooked! Still pink !!!!! I immediately call (after throwing up) for a refund and I was asked to take pics and text the pictures to them, wish they would have refunded the entire order for the inconvenience  but at least we got the wing money back. Terrible.

Ps- I stand corrected, I ATE TWO WINGS WHILE MY COMPANY ATE SOME OF THE OTHERS*

The website said 45-60 min for an order, when I placed my order. They automatically entered a tip in for them selves, which I could not take off and was more than 20%. I called at the 45 min mark to get an eta, and was told another 26 min. 26 min later still no food, when I called he said another 10-15 min. At that point I asked for a 15% refund, because we could have gotten other food. The guy I was speaking too told me oh well it's only been 61 min since you ordered...no it's been 116min. He just kept getting nasty and finally he threatened to cancel our order and still charge us. Turns out the pizza place snuck into our resort to drop off flyers and when we contacted the front desk to ask about them, they said they had multiple complaints. As the guy was dropping off our pizza at the now hour and a half mark, the front desk confronted him and he ran. Do not order from these scammers!
Great food, server it amazing and staff is very friendly, definitely will be back when I'm in vegas!!!

I placed an order with this restaurant just after they opened at 11 through the yelp app. An hour and a half later I call to see if they've received my order. At first he can't find it, then I realize he's looking for the wrong company as the order was placed through yelp, then street eats. Tells me it'll be on the way in 35 minutes. He called me back in a few minutes to inform me that my address is out of his delivery range but he'll make an exception as long as I take care of the driver. I informed him that there was already a tip included in the purchase but now you've officially made me feel obligated to tip even more. I called at the 2 and a half hour mark and he tells me that the driver is on the way. I should have just told them not to worry about it when I realized the order wasn't even started during the first call. 

Got the food at exactly three and a half hours after ordering it. Surprisingly it wasn't super cold. Pizza was good, wings were dry, fried mushrooms were soggy. It wouldn't be so upsetting if I didn't wait so long and get strung along. Would try again if I was absolutely desperate and for some reason near that restaurant....
Great pizza and the owner is very friendly. I feel like this'll be our go to pizza shop in Vegas.

Although my family just loves Pizza and will choose it 9 out of 10, we've discoved something new from Palermo's that is as equally delicious if not even better than their Pizza. They make a Cheeseburger that, if I can be so bold, is the best tasting burger I've had here, Looking back over the year, that means I've had at least 1 burger every 2 days, believe it or not. It is my favorite type of snack or food and I have gone to some pretty seedy looking places, all in my Quest to find the best. Talking to the owner of the store about his recipe, he asssured me that other than Purchasing a slightly Better type of Hamburger to make the burgers with, the only thing he changes is to add some special seasoning he carefully selects each time. Whatever it is, It definitely works. If you happen to stop at Palermo's anytime soon, Do yourself a favor and try the cheeseburger, I can guarantee you will be satisfied. Wait!!!!! I forgot to tell you the best part. These days, as places like 5 guys burgers are opening up across the nation and charging anywhere from 5.00 to 12.00 dollars a burger, Palermo's charges just 3.99 for just the burger, 1.00 more to add cheese, and 5.99 for the meal, which includes fries. I dare anybody to even try to find any thing even close to that! It is not possible!
Pizza not only taste bad have the cheese is on the side they obviously turn the pizza sideways their well done french fries turned out raw would not recommend

I called in my order for a medium sausage and mushroom pizza with a Greek salad. I was told it would take about 15 minutes. When I arrived in 10 minutes, the salad was ready and the pizza was emerging from the oven. I returned to my hotel and enjoyed a great in-room dinner with my hubby. We'll choose Palermo's when were in Las Vegas again.

I've been here several times. Place is clean and comfy and pizza is consistently delicious!  Not only that but they have this super fast ordering system.  Within a 55 second phone call, I was pleasantly addressed, reminded of my last order and confirmed it. Pizza ready in 20 minutes.  Badda Boom!  that simple that fast.  Good job guys!

Every place deserves a 2nd chance... So here I go, but this time I ordered a GodFather Sub lunch special, and 4 hot chicken fingers. Ordered my food at 11:15am. I got my food at 1:25pm. Over two hours.

There isn't a need to review the food whether its good or bad because when you're over 2 hours to deliver some food, then no need. 

I agree to "Kim A" on 7/4/2016. I called and asked where my order is and he assured that the driver was on his way. Then I get a text message 5 minutes later saying that the food will be delivered in 15 minutes.

If you really want to eat here. Don't order delivery.

No Stars!!!!! I placed an order at 11:40 and it's now 1:00pm and I have not received my order? Called to see what the status was and the cannot communicate with the driver like really?! You guys are a joke! Never again!! I don't want a free desert I want my order when it's supposed to be here! I had to cancel by the way .... smh!

This was the most ridiculous thing of my life. Not only were they an hour late delivering my food but the delivery dude was a complete asshole. It's not my responsibility to be your GPS. I gave him the hotel & the address & he still couldn't find the damn place. So let's review, extremely late, douchebag attitude, & oh yeah, the fucker didn't even have any change so he straight robbed me. Absolutely unacceptable!!! SHADY PLACE. SHADY PEOPLE.

Location - Strip Mall. Lots of parking.  

Place - Clean. Simple.  About 5-6 booths and table chairs out front. Order and pay at counter. Sit and they deliver to you.  

Food - Side salad was good. Leaves a bit large but fresh nonetheless. Dressing cold. 
Meat calzone was served hot. Great size.  Gold flavor. Bit too much olive oil brushed on but flavorful. 
Chicken wings were fried crispy.  And I mean crispy.  Meat was hard to chew.  Gave me 11 pieces when it was a 12 piece order. 

Staff - Owner and manager were at counter. Both older Spanish gentlemen.  The owner had a scowl face and the manager was smiley.  They intro'd themselves.  Very friendly ( and cute in a younger Bob Hoskins way). Thought he was flirting but he was like that with everyone that came in. Damn! ;)

Overall - food was decently priced, ok flavor.  I'm giving it 2 stars for the food.  I'd give 5 stars for the service but I go to eat at restaurants not socialize with the staff so the stars are for the food.
Best pizza ever and wings were better than BWW. not pricey at all. Definitely will return. Extremely friendly workers.

Ordered pizza and wings through the yelp app. It took an hour and a half for them to deliver cold greasy inedible food. I asked for ranch plates napkins crushed peppers and parmesan cheese and none of those items arrived. I would not recommend this place to anyone

I was starved. Looking for a place with cheap delivery and moderately priced food. I checked out this place due to it being close to my hotel. I ordered the pepperoni pizza and a dozen hot wings. The pizza was freshly made and the wings were really good. I called after ordering and the guy said he was able to deliver it before the normal 45min to an hour. That was a plus!!
Walked in looking for a bite to eat in the middle of the afternoon. The Greek pizza was delicious and very flavorful. I would return for another if the occasion arises .

Don't know what happened to this place. It was my go to delivery food. I think new owners run the place and the delivery and kitchen can't figure out how to deliver in a reasonable amount of time. First time it took over 3 and a half hours. I keep calling and put on hold until the manager said the food was on the way. I sent it all back except the wings which I reheated. I was hungry after almost three hours. In there favor they at least re-delivered the pizza and salad which was good and fresh. This painful process took over 3/half hours. So I just thought it must be a one time thing because I have ordered from them at least 25 times before. I only live less than 1 mile away. Last night the same thing happened. I was told it was the kitchens fault this time. I am a regular. You need to treat the people that give you recurring income with some respect as well as the people that choose to patronize your business. If the people you have working for your business are making the same mistakes daily it might be time to look for some new employees.

Ordered 2 sandwiches to be delivered from here. Luckily didn't get the slow delivery like most people experienced, it was actually pretty fast. The sandwiches were delicious too, with a good amount of meat and toppings on them.
Just fine.  Garlic knots were over cooked and the over thing else was just ok. Took an hour to get there food.  Nice people though.

Food seemed "fair" at best. Not worth the looong wait and 1/3 of it being missing. Pizza was mediocre at best; order elsewhere unless you're not used to the good stuff. Wait time for delivery too long for the quality.

Amazing pizza place, gentleman who served me couldn't do enough for me, giving me free cups to take away for my family. Pizza tasted great would highly recommend. They also took my order and told me the cheapest way to group the order. Very happy indeed

They just hang up on you if you are not sure what you want. The triple pepperoni is a lie this pizza place is lazy and I wouldn't call them ever there phone service is the worst ever. How awful is this place I heard they skimp on
Pepperoni lol

Tasteless pizza, nasty sauce, and didn't listen to my additional request.
Had flyers dropped off many times at home, thought I'd give them a try.. did one of their online deals, 2 16" 1 topping, 20 wings, and 2 liter. Delivery driver was nice. Pizza has very little taste, and what you do taste is overly sweet sauce which is straight from a can (can't possibly be made there). Wings weren't bad, but I specifically asked for lots of wing sauce on the wings AND in the container (love them drenched) and they were barely saucy, and the container was bone dry on the bottom. It's one thing to serve mediocre at best food, it's another to blatantly ignore a customer's request. 
Will stick with Angelina's, Pizza Hut, or even frozen Walmart brand.

So today is super bowl Sunday and my delivery is to be made ON the strip. I understand that delivery wont be the fastest but the customer service should still be present which was not the case with the rudest cashier ever. If I was the business owner I would have him fired. His name is Mike and when ordering he kept sighing as if it was such a pain to take my order. I tried to stay calm and pleasant as I know typically people like him would spit in your food if you make a complain. Now he did not let me ask the total of my orders until the very end where I had to interrupt him from ending the call. He just kept interrupting and talking about how he lost a driver and my wait would be for 2 hours, and which valet the driver would be at along with "if you don't show up he will drive away." Like sheesh dude I get it! Don't have to repeat it constantly. Once I got to ask him the total for the 1 and 2nd order (there was 3 orders) he gives me the total of all three orders backwards. How does that make any sense? Just give me the total of what I asked for. When you work on the strip you know that food is jacked up in price and even though I am in a good position at work paying $20 for a burger and fries here isn't something I want to do everyday, so me and my coworkers try different places to order from also to support smaller business, instead of these already multi million corporations. However after this experience me and my coworkers won't be ordering from this place again. I am writing this review first before eating, and the only one who was nice was the driver whom got here before the two hour wait the person on the phone said. If you are in the same position here on the strip try Sicili's Pizza on Twain, they were fast and friendly and the food was great, but we had to give this place a chance and it failed. Should have ordered from them instead of having to deal with horrible Mike.
Very surprised by Palermos!  Ordered one of the dinners for 2. Ordering was easy and delivery to our room at Ballys was free and fast!  Food was delivered hot and tasty!  Definitely a great deal!
Fresh delicious pizza! I highly recommend stoping in and training a slice or two it's yummy!

This place requires you don't have a blocked number to order. I ordered a 2-liter, sampler, and small white pizza. Delivery was estimated at an hour. The driver called me at that hour mark. He was having trouble finding the right building, it happens, no big deal... 7 minutes later and our conversation hadn't progressed. He didn't like the way the building layout or the way they numbered. A few minutes later he calls me again, same conversation. He wouldn't go to the map of the complex, and when I told him I was near a pool, he kept telling me there was no pool. (Because you're in the wrong section - but don't listen to me. Not like I live here or anything.)

I was annoyed and rather short, and he hangs up on me. Another few minutes, he gets to my apartment and states, "I hope I never have to deliver to this [expletive] hole again." He asked if I wanted to leave a tip. - I declined. They don't run cards over the phone, so I had to wait outside while he runs the card. (He did say I could wait inside, but I didn't trust this guy not to get lost again, with my card.) The pizza was excellent, the sampler was a generous portion. The onion rings were terrible, the rest of the sampler was pretty good, but it was all premade freezer section quality.     

So, the good: 
Pizza. Good ingredients, delicious. 
Pricing   

The bad: 
Cheap quality on the sampler.   

The ugly: 
Delivery driver was rude and inept, cursing didn't help. 
The shaken soda was also nice touch.         

Bottom line: I should have read the reviews before I ordered, although I still might have given this place a chance. I won't be ordering from here again based on the horrible customer service, which is a shame with pizza that good.
Got to believe in the Palermo's!! Super awesome of them to deliver one last order before they closed because my buddies and I were HUNGRY!! Sausage Pizza and Teriyaki wings are A1 must have.

I work around this area so I've been to this location way back when it was "big mamas and papas pizza". Menu hasn't changed much just different employees. Parking lot is shared with the businesses around there. 

Last time I stopped by I got the 12 inch pizza combo, and dined in. The was the first time I ate there most likely the last. The table we sat in had a hot sauce bottle that was empty. The guy that brought us our food quickly came dropped it and left, didn't say anything and didn't give us a chance to ask for another bottle of the hot sauce they had. There was another group of people eating there and they had left a soda bottle and some pizza behind. A employee came out to clean it and offered us the soda, weird...nice but weird lol. Service was ok could be better and the food is far from stunning.

From NYC and finding good pizza is very hard.  Well problem solved.  The White pizza I had today wasn't just good it was great*****. The menu offers many choices including gluten free.  Nice pizza parlor atmosphere and excellent service. In the Albertson Center an easy place to reach plus you can head over to many stores for your holiday shopping. Worth the trip for the great food.

They deliver and that is the extant of the good points. The pizza has the toppings and quality of a $1.29 totinos pizza for only  $15. Total waste of money and taste buds. Will never order from them again.
Excellent service and amazing pizza.  if you ever come to this place, try their cinnamon bread sticks!!

I ordered this pizza online through Eat24. We ordered a pizza and a 2 liter soda. I was a little confused why the cost of sauce was not in with the initial cost of pizza, but okay, paid $2 for sauce (just make the pizza cost $15, come on guys). So the order was placed at 6:50 to be delivered by 8:05. By 8:20 the pizza was not here so I called and they said "Oh yeah it's out for delivery." Cool, I can deal with that. 15 minutes later they call me and tell me that our order was caught in a "shift change" and was never made. They offered a discount (initially 50%, then $3, and then an email that said $2.09) and a free dessert. After the delivery guy got lost we got the pizza in about 25 minutes. So it arrived looking very undercooked and soggy. They could have kept it in the oven for like 5 more minutes and it would be good. I had a slice and fed my son some and then my husband went for his slice and found a hair embedded in it. Obviously we were both disgusted. My husband was already super fed up and gave them a call and they refused to refund it. They offered a free pizza but neither of us wanted soggy hair pizza. Luckily Eat24 has good customer service because now we can order a good pizza some where else!

The 2 liter was good though.

I just gave them a second chance before leaving a bad review. I don't like leaving bad reviews. I thought maybe it was a one time thing. We ordered online and it took OVER 2 hours to get here. When we called, the guy on the phone was very rude and tried making excuses - we're very busy, you're far from us, etc...
This is exactly what happened the last time. As far as the food goes: the ravioli is good, the fettuccine alfredo was very bland, the gyro and the philly steak sandwich were just ok. The french fries and the mozzarella sticks were soggy. I would imagine that they were in the car for a while. We were missing one of the dinner salads. There are many other options for Italian food delivery, this is the last time I order from them.

If you're getting wings, ask for extra wing sauce. They charge for extra ranch. Pizzas pretty good. I get the 16 inch with my roomies and eat it over the next 2 days Wings never last, especially with the extra sauce. Customer service behind the counter, ALWAYS NICE.
